dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: Hehehe. So it seems Timangelise and Rojatom both died. How tragic...

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: Think back to the choices you made.

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: Rojatom was right, Timangelise and Rojatom have to work together to get out of the rooms.

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: Could going to the pill room have been avoided? Was there another path that would open out?

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: Hehehe. Also, here's a hint: when in doubt, your best bet would the RIGHT choice.

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: It is possible for both of you to live. Try again?
